Plot: A cellular phone is possessed by the devil. A ranting man drives a luxury car while texting and screaming on the phone until he is texted by Satan.
Title: Cell from Hell
Writer: Sal Bienstock, Joseane Brunelle, Joseane Brunelle (story), Joseane Brunelle, Tristan Tondino, Tristan Tondino (story), Tristan Tondino
